thread.section_title: SIXTY LES - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, Location, and Comfort
thread.title_full: Location, Location, and Comfort - Review of SIXTY LES, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew M
title: Location, Location, and Comfort
text:
A very comfortable boutique hotel in the heart of the LES. So many restaurants, bars, and landmarks within walking distance...and next door to Rockwood Music Hall. The room was spacious, clean, modern, and very comfortable. There is blue ribbon sushi restaurant in the hotel, where we had breakfast as part of the package. Expected an average breakfast but had a delicious start to the day.
Room Tip: There is a club on one of the floors so avoid that floor if you dont like noise. See more room tips
